entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 08:30 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023
Temperature: -5.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -7.0°C
Wind: SSE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11 except minus 5 along the Strait.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11 except minus 5 along the Strait. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023
